#### Overall Appearance:
The bird in the image is predominantly black with a glossy, smooth texture to its plumage. It has a sleek, elongated body with a long, slightly forked tail extending beyond the branch it is perched on. The wings are relatively short and tucked close to the body, and the head is small in proportion to the body, with a pointed, slightly curved beak.
